name: Factory of Monsters
description: A big and strange factory suddenly appears in the city. Monsters emerge here and there. Officer of Star Troops, Su Anya, will come to the earth to help the army in the city. When she arrives at the destination, however, forests, mountains, and magic lives stop her marching forward...
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
